title: Grab the Hottest Black Friday Marketing Deals of 2023
description: Explore the list of top digital marketing and SEO deals, along with discount promo codes, to get the most out of Black Friday & Cyber Monday 2023.
content: Blog / SE Ranking News / Best Black Friday & Cyber Monday Deals of 2023 for Digital MarketersBest Black Friday & Cyber Monday Deals of 2023 for Digital Marketers Written by Yulia Deda Nov 17, 2023 23 min read Black Friday is already here, and hundreds of SEO and marketing offers, along with discounts, are already starting to overflow the internet. We don’t want you to miss out on any of the big deals that are currently available, so we handpicked the best ones from our friends and partners. We combined them to create this roundup blog post so you can take easy advantage of them. 1. SE Ranking SE Ranking is a robust SEO suite for agency and in-house professionals. With its help, SEOs can automate all of their routine tasks, from competitive research and backlink analysis to website auditing and SEO reporting. New assets are being added to the platform every year. In particular, four major features were introduced in 2023 alone. These included the Local Marketing tool, Insights feature, the AI Writing Assistant, and an updated AI-powered algorithm for making organic traffic estimation (which improved data accuracy by 29%). SE Ranking’s flexible pricing plans make it the go-to solution for small to mid-sized teams who are willing to scale their projects. Its starter pack includes a wide range of core tools for handling the entire SEO task lifecycle. Larger marketing agencies and businesses can opt for bigger subscription plans. These plans provide extended data limits and access to features like API, historical data on keywords/domains, Looker Studio integration, keyword database expansion, etc. By supercharging their subscriptions with an Agency Pack add-on, agencies can also benefit from features like White Label, Lead Generator, unlimited WL SEO reporting, extra client seats, and placement at the Agency Catalog. Offer This year, SE Ranking has prepared a massive once-in-a-lifetime deal! New users can enjoy a whopping 20% discount on annual subscriptions, plus get an extra 20% discount on all annual plans and add-ons for Black Friday. To grab this discount, start your free trial and click the Black Friday notification within the SE Ranking platform. Then, choose your subscription. No promo code required; your discount will be auto-applied. This offer is valid beginning from November 20 until December 4, so don’t miss your chance to gear up for the upcoming year at the best possible price! 2. Mirador Local Mirador Local is an all-in-one management tool for your Google Business Profile listings. With its help, you can manage your listings from a single dashboard, whether you have 10s, 100s, or 1000s of them. Mirador Local is cost-effective and allows you to publish promotions/updates and adjust opening hours within minutes, even if you have thousands of local profiles. Offer From October 31 to November 30, get 50% off on any package for six months using the promo code BlackFriday. 3. Plerdy Plerdy is an all-in-one website analysis tool designed for Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) & SEO. It allows businesses to track, analyze, and convert visitors into buyers with AI assistance. Its features include UX analytics, e-commerce insights, AI-powered reports, and heatmap capabilities. Offer Starting from November 24 until December 1, you can get 50% OFF on annual plans for Plerdy by using the promo code plerdyBF2023. 4. Internxt Internxt is an open-source cloud storage provider designed to put users first and protect clients’ data privacy and safety. Internxt users get access to Internxt Drive, Photos, and Send. All three services work together to empower users to store, share, and back up large files and photos securely. Offer Get a 91% discount on annual subscriptions for Internxt. No coupon required. Just register via the dedicated link until November 30, 2023. 5. Brand24 Brand24 is an AI-powered media monitoring and social listening tool offering the capability to not only detect online mentions of your brand but also furnish you with a wealth of valuable insights into your brand’s reputation. Should you seek a user-friendly option for overseeing media content, Brand24 certainly stands out as a valuable choice. Not only will you receive a summary of your brand’s media coverage, but also you’ll get access to some analytics regarding your brand health, such as sentiment analysis, reach, AVE calculations, and many more. Offer From November 20 until November 27, Brand24 is offering a 50% discount on any plan for three months, charged monthly. To get this offer, simply sign up here. 6. Cloudways Cloudways offers reliable, scalable, and user-friendly hosting solutions designed for various needs. Whether you’re launching a personal blog or scaling an e-commerce business, this platform ensures optimal performance. Enjoy seamless web experiences backed by robust infrastructure and intuitive tools. Offer Until December 1, get a massive 40% discount for 4 months on all our hosting plans. Plus, leverage up to 40 free migrations to make your switch even smoother. Just type in the coupon code BFCM4040. 7. Chanty Chanty is an all-in-one team collaboration platform for remote and onsite business teams of all sizes. Chanty offers unlimited searchable messaging, audio and video calls with screen sharing. It also offers task management with the Kanban board and voice messaging to communicate on the go. Offer Until December 3, new teams, and teams using the Chanty Free Plan, can either get 20% off their monthly plan or 40% off their annual plan. No coupon required; just click this link and choose your offer. 8. POWR POWR is one of the web’s leading plugin libraries, which has successfully helped over 8 million small businesses grow online. With over 60 profit-generating and customer support tools such as Form Builder, Popup, Live Chat, and Social Feed, you can enhance your online presence without needing any code, as well as increase the number of leads and conversion rates. You can also gain premium access to all POWR apps via POWR One. It is an all-in-one platform app suite for small businesses that are interested in scaling or expanding their company quickly. Offer Enjoy a 30% discount for 12 months on Form Builder, Live Chat, Instagram Feed, and 50 other plugins. Plus, get 50% off on 4 POWR apps like popups, countdown timers, payment buttons, and image sliders. To select and grab the discount, click this link. This offer is valid up until November 29, 2023. 9. Sender Sender is an email and SMS marketing platform that helps you build automation workflows that boost your sales and revenue. With Sender’s detailed analytics and newsletter heatmap, you get a clear picture of how those campaigns perform. In addition, you can attract quality leads with its high-converting popups. You can also design professional emails using its drag-and-drop email builder and responsive templates. Offer Use the PARTNER20 promo code to get a 20% discount on any plan (monthly or yearly). This offer is valid up until November 27, 2023. 10. Retainful Retainful is an all-encompassing email marketing automation platform, empowering Woocommerce and Shopify stores to boost sales through features like abandoned cart recovery, automated emails with dynamic coupons, and a flexible drag-and-drop editor. Enhanced with real-time analytics, exit-intent popups, a robust referral program, broadcast and segmentation tools, Retainful delivers personalized and strategic communication to optimize customer engagement and increase revenue. Trusted globally by over 15,000 store owners, it’s considered one of the top tools for Shopify stores. Offer Use code BFCM30 to get a one-time 30% discount on any plan for Retainful. This offer is valid up until December 5, 2023. 11. ThemeSelection ThemeSelection provides fully coded and expertly designed Admin Templates & UI kits. If you are looking for developer-friendly, highly customizable, and easy-to-use admin dashboard templates for your app development, then ThemeSelection is the right place for you. Create any kind of web app such as SaaS apps, Fitness Apps, Educational Apps, E-commerce apps, etc., using these fully coded and professionally designed Admin Templates & UI Kits. Offer Until November 30, ThemeSelection is offering 30% OFF under its Cyber Big Bundle on this Black Friday & Cyber Monday. To enjoy this discount, use the promo code CW30OFF during checkout. 12. MySignature MySignature is an all-in-one email signature and email tracking platform. It allows you to easily create professional email signatures and make your business emails stand out from the crowd. With MySignature, you can build brand recognition by turning yourself and your team into brand ambassadors. Embedding a unique email signature will help you advertise your products or services in a more efficient way. Offer Use the coupon code ​​SigFriday2023 from November 20 until 30 to get 50% off of the first payment for all yearly plans. 13. Newoldstamp Newoldstamp is the leading email signature management platform. It empowers businesses to effortlessly design and implement brand-consistent signatures across the entire organization. With its help, you can direct traffic to your website, generate leads, upsell products, and announce both online and offline events by adding clickable links, eye-catching banners with clear calls to action, and interactive buttons to your email signature. This email signature software seamlessly integrates with popular platforms like Google Workspace, Exchange, and Microsoft 365. Create an email signature that looks fantastic across various email clients (including Gmail, Outlook, Apple Mail, iOS, Thunderbird, and more) and on all devices. Offer Use the coupon code BF2023NOS from November 20 until 30 to get 25% off of any plan (recurring discount for all new payments). 14. Mockplus RP Mockplus RP is a super-fast online prototyping tool that enables designers, developers and teams to create designs of all levels in just minutes. This involves everything from simple sketches and user flows to click-through wireframes and highly interactive prototypes, and anything in between. This tool offers everything you need to bring design ideas to life right in the web browser. It also gives you the opportunity to co-design with your team anytime and anywhere, test designs on real devices, and share them via a single link to collect valuable feedback, all without any coding. Offer Get up to 60% off on all Mockplus plans—with prices as low as $9.90 per user per month. No coupon needed, just register via the dedicated link, which is active until November 30, 2023. 15. Linkhouse Linkhouse is a content marketing and link building platform that saves thousands of hours of work each month for specialists dealing with content publication. With a database covering nearly 70,000 websites from Poland and dozens of other countries, it offers the largest selection on the market. For nine years, it has been helping companies of all sizes, from SMEs to leaders in the Polish e-commerce market. Offer Save up to 60% off on selected guest posts and link insertions. Discounts are valid up until November 27, 2023. 16. Placeit If you’re in search of an all-in-one solution for your branding design needs, look no further than Placeit. This versatile platform boasts a staggering 50,000+ templates, constantly expanding with new designs crafted daily by skilled professionals. Whether you’re using it to make captivating logos, engaging videos, or striking imagery for your social media campaigns, Placeit empowers you to create them in just minutes. Plus, you can harness the power of AI to generate logos and other design assets, including mockups. You can also promote your own Cyber Monday deals using Placeit’s Cyber Monday templates for Cyber Monday flyers, Cyber Monday images, Cyber Monday banners, Coupons, and much more! Offer From November 20 until November 27, active annual subscribers can renew their subscriptions for 50% off. In turn, new users and monthly subscribers can sign up for an annual subscription and receive 25% off starting from November 24 until November 27. Visit this link to redeem your offer. 17. Crawlbase Smart Proxy Explore Crawlbase Smart Proxy for effortless web scraping and data extraction. Boost your crawling capabilities effortlessly, ensuring reliable and uninterrupted access to valuable web resources. Offer Enjoy a 20% lifetime discount on Smart Proxy with the coupon code FRIDAYSP20. This offer is valid from November 20 until December 20, 2023. 18. OneStream Live OneStream Live is a cutting-edge cloud-based live streaming solution. It empowers users to effortlessly create, schedule, and multistream real-time and recorded live content across 45+ social media platforms and the web simultaneously. Offer Get 20% off on all monthly plans for the first three months using the coupon code BFCM20. To receive a 15% discount on annual plans, apply the BFCM15 promo code during checkout. This offer is valid up until December 10, 2023. For more information, follow this link. 19. ThimPress ThimPress can help you create great and easy-to-use products: WordPress Theme, WordPress Plugin, Shopify Theme, Shopify App, and Mobile App. With over 10 years in the industry, this platform has all the resources you need to build and launch a website in less than a day. Offer Until November 30, ThimPress is offering you a 25% discount on all LearnPress add-ons. To redeem this offer, use the PROBF2023 promo code. 20. The Affiliate Lab The Affiliate Lab is a training program with over 200 videos on how to build, rank, and monetize affiliate websites in any niche. Here’s a list of some modules you can find on it: The Authority Module: How to Create Algorithm-Proof Authority Sites in 2023 The Kitchen Sink: How to Get Sites Unstuck Conversion Rate Optimization Mastery Plus, Matt Diggity is also throwing in a free bonus this year with his brand new course on Personal Branding. Offer From November 24 until November 27, the Affiliate Lab is offering 50% off on its entire suite of affiliate marketing and SEO courses. To access courses at a discounted price, make sure to visit the Affiliate Lab Black Friday deal page and sign up for the program. 21. WPExperts WPExperts is an agency that excels in web development, design, mobile apps, custom plugins, ERP integrations, LMS development, e-commerce, payment gateways, migration, multilingual solutions, technical consultation, WordPress retainers, and staff augmentation. Offer Enjoy WPExperts’ Black Friday discount for top plugins like myCred. They are offering a full 23% off. Use the discount code BFCM2023, which is active starting from November 20 through to December 4. 22. Cheqmark Cheqmark is an ultimate free checklist maker tool, which has been designed to elevate daily routines and revolutionize your approach to productivity. Offer Enjoy an exclusive Black Friday 40% discount on a yearly subscription for Premium features (all Premium templates included). To get this discount, use the promo code BF2023CQM, which will remain active until December 5, 2023. 23. Snov.io Snov.io is your go-to solution for email outreach and sales automation. This all-in-one platform offers email finding, verification, drip campaigns, deliverability features, a free sales CRM, as well as 5,000+ apps. Integrations – all budget-friendly and user-centered. Snov.io’s brilliant support team helps to use the platform to your best advantage. Offer From November 20 until December 1, Snov.io cuts its annual prices for all premium plans in half only for the Black Friday season. To grab the discount, apply the BLACKFRIDAY23 coupon code during checkout. 24. LearnWorlds LearnWorlds is an AI-powered online course platform that helps you create, market and sell online courses. It’s a platform that is suitable for every content creator, blogger, coach, educator or instructor as well as trainers, and businesses of any size that want to deliver training to their employees, partners, associates and customers. Offer Get up to 39% off for a year of LearnWorlds’ top online course platform and two mobile apps. No coupon required. Just register via the dedicated link until November 27, 2023. 25. SmartReach.io SmartReach.io is a sales engagement platform that helps you reach prospects across multiple channels, including email, LinkedIn, WhatsApp, SMS, and calls. It also has a shared inbox for team collaboration, AI content recommendations, and integrations with popular CRM and marketing automation platforms. Offer Until December 3, use the coupon code ​​SMARTREACH20BF2023 to get 20% off on all annual plans for the first year. 26. Retable Retable is an online spreadsheet solution to help you organize your workflows, projects, teams and business operations. With a user-friendly spreadsheet-like UI, Retable offers you real-time collaboration and easy-to-use rich features to manage your projects and business workflows. Offer Get 50% off the Team plan by applying the RTBLBF50 coupon code during checkout. The offer is valid up until the end of this year—December 31. 27. Yespo Yespo is an omnichannel customer data platform that offers ready-made tools and campaigns for large and medium ecommerces. It allows you to instantly receive additional income from existing customers. Using Yespo, marketers can customize segments of any complexity, create workflows and use the most profitable triggers, and generate personalized product recommendations based on AI. Yespo provides 8 channels for customer communication: email, web and mobile push, in-app, app inbox, widgets, SMS, Viber. Offer This year, Yespo is giving a 25% discount on all plans for new and existing customers with the CDP-BF-2023 promo code (except for SMS and Viber campaigns). To redeem the offer, make sure to apply for it until December 1, 2023. 28. CallHippo CallHippo is a leading virtual call center solution catering to businesses of all sizes. With tailored features for enhancing customer experiences and empowering sales teams, CallHippo integrates seamlessly with over 100 applications, such as Shopify, Zapier, Freshdesk, and HubSpot, automating your call center operations. Offer Until November 24, you can save 15% on the “Silver Plan” for the Annual CallHippo Plan. To grab the discount, reach out to [email protected] for your coupon code. 29. Dokan Dokan is one of the most widely used WooCommerce multivendor marketplace solutions currently available on the market. With its comprehensive suite of features, you can effortlessly create a fully functional multivendor marketplace and empower your business to new heights. Offer Until December 5, secure the deal and enjoy up to 45% off on Dokan Multivendor. No promo code required. Follow this link to confirm your deal. 30. weDevs weDevs is the creator of WordPress products like Dokan Multivendor, WP ERP, WP User Frontend Pro, weMail, wePOS, Appsero, and more. Whether you need tools for your business, project management, or customer support, weDevs has got you covered with great deals. Offer For this year’s Black Friday and Cyber Monday sale, weDevs is offering discounts of up to 50% on its master products. Go through the dedicated link to choose and enjoy your deal. The offer is valid up to December 5, 2023. 31. Influencer Hero Influence Hero is an all-in-one influencer marketing platform helping brands achieve 10X+ ROI. By leveraging big data, automation & AI to increase conversions, lower CAC, and collect high-quality UGC for brands worldwide, Influencer Hero stands out as a leading web solution trusted by 250+ brands & 50+ agencies. Offer Through November 30, you can receive a 55% discount on the Pro Plan and, therefore, decrease your spendings from $549 to $249. No coupon code needed. Follow this link to secure the deal. 32. Opinion Stage Opinion Stage is a powerful and interactive content creation service that can help you connect with your audience, collect leads, drive sales, and more. With its intuitive tools, you can create beautiful quizzes, surveys, and polls in minutes without any coding expertise. Whether you’re teaching a class, meeting with your team over Zoom, or driving traffic to your ecommerce site, Opinion Stage’s tools are a great way to collect authentic feedback wherever you are. Offer Until November 30, apply the blkf2023 promo code during checkout to get 20% off any of Opinion Stage plans and save up to $597 on the annual plans. 33. Whatagraph Whatagraph is a marketing data platform that marketers use to connect scattered marketing sources, easily turn that siloed data into insightful marketing reports, and automate how they are shared. Connect any marketing source with 45+ native integrations, Custom API, or spreadsheets. Create stunning marketing reports in minutes using the drag-and-drop builder. Plus, it’s fully customizable with cross-channel widgets, filtering and custom calculations. Anything you create can be saved as a template, reused and edited at once + easy-to-set-up data transfers to Google BigQuery available. Offer For Black Friday 2023, Whatagraph is offering 20% off all first-year plans, 20% off on add-ons, and 20% on existing plans scale-ups. To redeem your offer, use the discount code BF2023, which is active up until November 30. 34. BuddyBoss Web BuddyBoss Web is the premier solution to build online courses and communities using WordPress. It comes with a theme and a platform plugin to allow users to build the site of their dreams, without any coding skills. It integrates seamlessly with top LMS plugins for educational capabilities and provides a drag-and-drop editor for easy site-building. The site also allows you to create a social networking site with member profiles, groups, activity feeds, notifications, and much more. Additionally, the platform offers comprehensive customization options, live streaming capabilities with Zoom and YouTube Live, and allows for unlimited members and groups to support community growth. Offer 1 Starting November 21 through to December 1, you can get 20% off BuddyBoss All-In-One Bundle. This all-encompassing package includes a 1-year license of the BuddyBoss App + DFY Web + a 1-year license of Theme & Platform Pro + DFY App. Offer 2 BuddyBoss offers an exclusive Theme & Platform Pro Lifetime Deal. Plus, you get 30% off on the BuddyBoss Theme and Platform and 25% off on the BuddyBoss app. For more information on these offers, make sure to check out this dedicated Black Friday page. 35. Typito Typito is an easy-to-use online video maker offering an exhaustive collection of motion templates including titles, intros, lower thirds, timers and more. With the All-Star Motion Pack, you can now customize, and download these templates with transparent/no background and use them in any video editor. Offer Up until November 27, Typito is offering the first 500 customers to get lifetime access to all templates on any editor for as little as $99. To claim the offer, go through this link and confirm the deal. 36. Sheeter Sheeter is an advanced AI-powered tool that generates complex formulas with ease, saving time and boosting efficiency. Offer Sheeter.ai is running a Black Friday campaign on their plans, with a special offer on the Diamond plan. This plan, usually priced at $49.99 per month, is now available for just $6.99 per month. The offer will remain active until November 30, 2023. 37. Zegal Zegal is a comprehensive, user-friendly CLM platform to streamline contract creation, negotiation, and execution. Users can effortlessly collaborate with team members and external parties, while customizable templates and a centralized repository make managing contracts a breeze. Offer Until November 28, Zegal is offering 30% off an annual Solo Plan. To grab the discount, go through this dedicated link and secure the deal. 38. Outgrow Outgrow is a platform that lets you create interactive content such as quizzes, forms, surveys, etc., without any knowledge of coding required. Powerful features such AI content generator and drag-n-drop ability make Outgrow tool a must-have for marketers looking to generate leads using Interactive content. Offer With this year’s Black Friday deal, all new users can avail 1 free trial + 25% off on annual subscription plans for Outgrow. To get the discount, follow this dedicated link and claim the offer until November 30, 2023. 39. Pixpa Pixpa is an all-in-one, no-code website builder that helps create beautiful, professional websites with an in-built online store, a dynamic blog, client galleries, ecommerce galleries, a photo gallery app, and marketing tools. Pixpa’s versatile platform has everything you need to showcase your work, share ideas, and sell your work online without any coding knowledge. Offer Till the end of this year, Pixpa is offering a 50% discount on annual plans and a 63% discount on biannual plans with the BLFPIXPA50 promo code. 40. ControlHippo ControlHippo’s WhatsApp Shared Inbox is a powerful tool designed to enhance customer communication for businesses. Key features include real-time message synchronization, allowing multiple team members to access and respond to messages simultaneously. This fosters teamwork and ensures prompt and consistent replies to customer inquiries. Offer Using the BF20 promo code, you can get 20% off on all plans for ControlHippo’s WhatsApp Shared Inbox. The offer is valid until November 30, 2023. 41. NOVA A.I. NOVA A.I. is a simple yet powerful video editor with AI-powered features to help you create the most captivating and engaging videos. Offer Until November 30, you can get 30% off any plan of your choice for life. To grab the discount, apply the BLACKFRIDAY30 promo code during checkout. 42. NapoleonCat NapoleonCat is an all-in-one social media management platform that helps you connect your teams and untangles your workflows. It allows you to moderate, publish, analyze, and grow. Offer By using the BF2023 coupon code during November 24-27, 2023, you can get 30% off on NapoleonCat’s Social Media Management Tool. 43. Bouncer Bouncer is an email validation platform that allows you to increase your email marketing ROI and land smoothly in your recipient’s inboxes. It also offers bulk Email Address Verification and Validation API. Offer This Black Friday, Bouncer offers 40% extra credits for all pay-as-you-go purchases. 44. Certifier Certifier is a digital credentials infrastructure that has everything you need to generate certificates. It includes a certificate builder to create, share, and verify digital certificates and also offers functionality for templates, emails, security, and analytics. Offer Certifier is offering a 30% discount on annual plans and special free Black Friday bonuses that come as additional features. 45. Surfer Surfer is a content tool that helps you research topics, audit content, write and optimize texts, as well as generate SEO-friendly copies automatically. Offer This year’s Black Friday deal from Surfer lets you double your credits and get up to 30% off. 46. Smartsupp Smartsupp is a personal online shopping assistant. They offer AI-based tools, LeadGen Chatbots, Live Chat, and more to engage visitors and drive online sales. Offer For Black Friday, Smartsupp is offering a 50% discount on their Standard Package. What’s more, you can be among the first to access their AI Shopping Assistant. 47. Quetext Quetext is a plagiarism checker that analyzes your text to identify plagiarism, resolve other writing issues, and build citations. This is a powerful instrument for students, teachers, and copywriters. Offer Quetext is offering up to 60% off subscriptions for Back to School. The icing on the cake is that new features are added. 8975 views Written by Yulia Deda Yulia Deda is a content marketer at SE Ranking. She is passionate about all things SEO, with a particular focus on analytics & reporting, technical SEO, and keyword research. In her spare moments, Yulia enjoys watching documentaries or immersing herself in a captivating book.

headers.text: Best Black Friday & Cyber Monday Deals of 2023 for Digital Marketers

author: Yulia Deda
